summary: A futuristic Breve encuentro (1945), this is a love story in which the romance is doomed by genetic incompatibility.
cast: Tim Robbins|Togo Igawa|Nabil Elouahabi|Samantha Morton|Sarah Backhouse|Jonathan Ibbotson|Natalie Mendoza|Om Puri|Emil Marwa|Nina Fog|Bruno Lastra|Christopher Simpson|Lien Nguyin|David Fahm|Jeanne Balibar|Mick Jones|Taro Bahar|Nina Sosanya|Shelley King|Tuyet Le|Benedict Wong|Nina Wadia|Essie Davis|Teo-Wa Vuong|Jennifer Lim|Archie Panjabi|Paul Barnes|Louis Lin|Nabil Massad|Kerry Shale|Kristin Scott Thomas|Bernadette Jane Vanderkar
title: Código 46
